This place is awesome!  We have been in Barcelona for four days now, and have lots of amazing meals, but this might have been the best.  Thanks Rick Steves for the recommendation!  :)The octopus was awesome, it is very difficult to cook octopus so it is not chewy, and La Flauta nailed it!  My husband was even impressed, and he is Portuguese and eats octopus all the time!  The grilled clams were excellent, the patatas bravas, everything was so good!  We ordered a delicious dessert of the day, a cake topped with chocolate sauce (we saw the table next to us eating it and they recommended it).La Flauta is a very cool tapas bar and restaurant, full of locals.  Definitely go here if you're in Barcelona, but go early!!  We got there at 9 and waited 45 minutes for a table.  Another couple got there at 7:30, and they did not have to wait at all.
